image_requirements.description: Ghost imagery is required for all Women's garments for the Zeekit virtual try-on feature.
All Women's Garments are required for the ghost imagery, excluding Women's Maternity Wear, Shapewear, Lingerie, Undergarments, Hosiery & Socks.
Any products with thumb holes, White Lace, See-through, Netted, or Mesh Materials cannot be captured.
Packaging product shots will be designated as the 1st alternate shot online, with the primary shot being out of packaging and/or on model.

summary: The Zeekit image requirements specify that ghost imagery is mandatory for all Women's garments for the virtual try-on feature, detailing the exclusions and providing guidelines for capturing images.
